doc.field: Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records

This series contains annual financial reports from the Grand Lodge, 1963; New York District #4, 1959 to 1969; the Vasa Club of Brooklyn, 1961 and 1965; Nobel #64, 1947 to 1970; Nobel-Liljan #64, 1970 to 1971; Nordstjernan# 89, 1906 to 1975, with intermittent gaps from 1909 to 1961; Liljan #107, 1966 to 1970 (missing 1969); St. Erik #338, 1916 to 1949 (missing 1917 and 1935); and Harmony #476, 1934 to 1971 (missing 1941 to 1944). These reports are rich sources of information, as they not only include a financial report for the lodge, but a list of lodge officers, new members, active and passive members, and members who transferred or deceased. Some of these reports also contain interleaved trustees reports and treasurers' reports. Many are in Swedish.
Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
